title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather dashboard application with search functionality to find current weather conditions and the future weather outlook for multiple cities.

title: Shows in Denver
description: Search for concerts in Denver, CO by artist and date. Using JavaScript, Materialize, jQuery, moment.js, Google Map API, and Seatgeek API. Mobile first design.

title: Day Planner
description: A calendar application that allows the user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Whiskey Journal
description: A responsive whiskey journal for logging whiskey tasting notes.

title: Pilates Website
description: A business website for a pilates business.
